name: Haismart
0:
”Alexa, turn on air conditioner”
”Alexa, set air conditioner to cool mode”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You're just a few words away from a smart home! All connected air conditioner Series are compatible with Alexa-enabled devices.

New! You can add air conditioner to your Haismart app, to adjust the room temperature with your voice.

To use this skill, click the "enable" button above and log in with your Haismart account to connect to your air conditioner. You must create a Haismart account and bind your air conditioner in Haismart app. Follow Haismart app binding steps of air conditioning according to the prompts.

Here are some of the phrases you can use for voice commands to control what your air conditioner in your home or to adjust room temperature. Use the device name specified on Haismart instead of device name , e.g. Air Conditioner, on the following examples:

Turn On
 "Alexa, turn on Air Conditioner."

Turn Off
"Alexa, turn off Air Conditioner."

Set Temperature
 "Alexa, Set the Air Conditioner to 25 degrees."

Set Mode
 "Alexa, Set the Air Conditioner to cool mode."

Query Temperature
 "Alexa, what's the Air Conditioner set to?"


Query Mode
"Alexa, what mode is Air Conditioner in?"

Adjust Temperature
 "Alexa, increase Air Conditioner by 1 degrees."
 "Alexa, decrease Air Conditioner by 1 degrees."
